TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Fudafudak, title = Fudafudak, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fudafudak} }

S.FORM: Fudafudak Itiniay i Beinan Cen no Taitung ko Fudafudak a niyaro', 67 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 152 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 7% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 10 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 93% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 142 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 3%, Paiwan 1%, Puyuma 2%.

Fodafodak Itiniay i Beinan Cen no Taitong ko Fodafodak a niyaro', 67 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 152 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 7% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 10 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 93% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 142 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 3%, Paiwan 1%, Poyoma 2%.
